HOME.PRE_START: Before continuing you must click on the **{{button}}** button.
HOME.DESCRIPTION:
Start configuring Filo by selecting the category of modules you want to configure and then select the module you want to operate with.

**Do you need a reference guide? Don't worry!**
By **[clicking here]({{url}})**, you'll redirect to the Filo's Wiki, which contains information on how to configure anything.

**Too complicated?**
**[Contact us]({{url2}})** if you have any questions or require any additional clarification.

ADMINISTRATION.LABEL: Administration
ADMINISTRATION.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you in the administration of your server.

COMMUNITY.LABEL: Community Modules
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you improve the experience in your community.

MODERATION.LABEL: Moderation Modules
MODERATION.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you moderate your server.

HOME.TITLE: Filo Setup Menu

LOADING_DATA: Please wait while the necessary data is loaded.

MODULES.SELECT_A_MODULE: You must select the module from the **{{module}}** category that you want to configure.
MODULES.SELECT_THE_ACTION: You must select the action you want to perform on the module.
MODULES.RESET_REQUEST_WARNING: Are you sure you want to reset the **{{module}}** module? This action can't be undone!
MODULES.MODULE_RESET: The **{{module}}** module has been reset successfully.

LANGUAGE.LABEL: Language
LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Change the language of Filo on this server.
LANGUAGE.SELECT_A_LANGUAGE: You must select the language you want to set.
LANGUAGE.LANGUAGE_SET: The language has been set to **{{language}}**.

VIEW.TITLE: Viewing the settings of the **{{module}}** module
